mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAYROLL, EMP WHERE PAYROLL.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO

SELECT PAYROLL.EMP_NO AS empNo, PAYROLL_NO, BASIC_SALARY, OVERTIME_ALLOWANCE, HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE, ANNUAL_LEAVE_ALLOWANCE, MEAL_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES, BONUS, SPECIAL_ALLOWANCE, EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, HEALTH_INSURANCE, NATIONAL_PENSION, TAX, LOCAL_INCOME_TAX, PAYROLL_BANK, PAYROLL_ACCOUNT, PAYROLL_DATE,
(BASIC_SALARY + OVERTIME_ALLOWANCE + HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE + ANNUAL_LEAVE_ALLOWANCE + MEAL_EXPENSES + TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES + BONUS + SPECIAL_ALLOWANCE) AS totalSalary ,
((BASIC_SALARY + OVERTIME_ALLOWANCE + HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE + ANNUAL_LEAVE_ALLOWANCE + MEAL_EXPENSES + TRANSPORTATION_EXPENSES + BONUS + SPECIAL_ALLOWANCE) - (EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE + HEALTH_INSURANCE + NATIONAL_PENSION + TAX + LOCAL_INCOME_TAX)) AS netSalary ,
(EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE + HEALTH_INSURANCE + NATIONAL_PENSION + TAX + LOCAL_INCOME_TAX) AS ehntl ,
(EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE + HEALTH_INSURANCE + NATIONAL_PENSION) AS fourMajorInsurances ,
EMP_NAME, EMP_JOBCODE
FROM PAYROLL, EMP WHERE PAYROLL.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO AND PAYROLL.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
